text: Florent Hasani (born 30 March 1997) is a Kosovan professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Hungarian club Diósgyőri VTK. ==Club career== On 25 January 2018, Hasani joined Nemzeti Bajnokság I side Diósgyőri VTK on a free transfer. Four days later, the club confirmed that Hasani's transfer was permanent. On 20 February 2018, he made his debut in the 2017–18 Magyar Kupa fourth round versus Vác, playing full-90 minutes in a 2–0 away win. ==International career== ===Under-21=== On 21 March 2017. Hasani received a call-up from Kosovo U21 for a 2019 UEFA European Under-21 Championship qualification match against Republic of Ireland U21 and made his debut after being named in the starting line-up. ===Senior=== On 22 January 2018, Hasani received his first call-up from national senior team in a friendly match against Azerbaijan. The match however was cancelled two days later, which prolonged his debut. He made his debut on 10 September 2019 in a Euro 2020 qualifier against England. He substituted Valon Berisha in the 85th minute and the final score of 3–5 already established. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Kosovo's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" !
